name: Gallery ONE - A Doubletree Guest Suites Hotel

reviews.text: The best part is that these are suites, so you have a full kitchen. For me this is great, I save on meals. It has good views, is clean, not loud, good crowd.
reviews.title: Good location, my own little apartment in FLL

reviews.text: Unfortunately parking is overpriced.
reviews.title: Perfect location

reviews.text: And they should stop charging for Internet .... is like charging for having water in the toilet, come on !!! is 2011 not 1996 !!
reviews.title: Hold onto your Car Keys.........

reviews.text: Love this place! I've stayed here 5 times for a week at a time. Just beware that none of the rooms have bathtubs. Also ask for a room with a full balcony.
reviews.title: Very Accomodating

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I recently stayed at this hotel in March and could not believe the
reviews.title: Very nice property

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall our hotel experience here was average. Of course we were greeted with the warm cookies, which I loved. The front desk upgraded us to the 'water view' room, because they had already sold out of city view rooms for the night. Unfortunately, our water view room was a view of the drawbridge being worked on the entire week. Definitely not the hotel's fault, but a slight annoyance when they were working and we were sleeping.
reviews.title: Hotel was Average - but with a great location

reviews.text: The cleanliness of the hotel was very nice. The housekeeping kept up with our sandy room from the beach and always provided us with multiple towels when asked.
reviews.title: Extremely happy with our stay

reviews.text: The lady bartender every evening was wonderful! She even helped us uncork a bottle of wine when the corkscrew in the room broke.
reviews.title: Aspires to be upscale--and fails

reviews.text: The pool was wonderful and clean, although the outside bar wasn't open all week long.
reviews.title: Location, Rooms are great. Front Desk Service is terrible!
Nice Hotel to be close to the beach, "please read review"
reviews.text: The downfalls.. service was just average. Nothing was about and beyond. When I reserved the room I requested for robes to be in the room and all kitchen items to be filled, there was even a charge to have someone bring them to the room before arrival. When we got there, there were no robes or kitchen utensils. I called to the front desk and they were brought up. Thankfully, the charges were taken off my bill before we left.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at the Double Tree last year for labor day and decided to give them another try.
reviews.title: AN UPGRADE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I should say it was a completely different aura than my last stay.
reviews.title: Awesome Hotel

reviews.text: The staff was excellent! Marissa checked us in. She was extremely cheerful, approachable and intuitive to our every need.
reviews.title: No value for money
Fantastic Hotel and Staff
reviews.text: We ordered room service. The meal arrived hot, in a timely manner and of course delicious.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would definitely recommend Double Tree to friends and family!
reviews.title: Massive air-conditioning failure

reviews.text: This hotel was packed with pre-cruise travelers which should not be unusual. However, their staff was rude and they ran out of breakfast at 9:00. Ordering off the menu took over an hour. Not a pleasant stay and a hectic way to start our vacation.
reviews.title: Service very poor. Would not recommend.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived quite late after travelling from London to be greeted by very welcoming
reviews.title: excellent hotel in very good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: friendly staff who were very helpful.We got upgraded to a room with an intercoastal and drawbridge view which had everything we needed for our 2 night stay. It was nice to be able to walk to the shopping mall and restaurants which we did. We would certainly come again.
reviews.title: Great room, friendly helpful staff, very good value!

reviews.text: We were lucky enough to get an extra day of vacation in Fort Lauderdale and got a decent price for a Friday night stay last minute on the Hilton website.
reviews.title: A pleasant surprise off the beach. A great pre-cruise hotel.

reviews.text: We were greeted by a very friendly guest services employee. We are Hilton Gold members and We were upgraded to a 7th floor balcony suite overlooking the intercoastal. We were warned the bridge traffic could be noisy but we wanted the view.
reviews.title: Nice location, extremely-well kept. Not sure if I would pay full rack rate though.

aka: Gallery One - a Doubletree Guest Hotel Fort Lauderdale
description: Perfectly situated on the main Intracoastal Waterway, GALLERYone DoubleTree Suites by Hilton , is the city's premier boutique hotel that exemplifies the casual elegance and sophistication. In a superb location, Gallery One is an easy three block walk to Fort Lauderdale's beautiful sandy beaches and blue Atlantic Ocean, directly adjacent to Galleria Mall - an upscale mall that boasts Neiman Marcus, Saks, Macy's, Dillards, and over 120 special stores PLUS Capital Grille, Seasons 52, P.F. Chang's, and Blue Martini!
